name: Edds Kindergarten Demo 1
description:
Edds kindergarten 1.0.0 is here! Pretty short mascot horror game inspired to be a better version of garten of banban, but dont think this is bad! The full game will have:

Better graphics - better rooms - atleast 3 bosses and ect

Full game will be on probably December 18 2023

Subcribe to Fredbob for having the best speedrun: 2:02, pretty impressive!

Heres his youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/@FredBob_Gaming

We also have a new discord! https://discord.gg/2By8uatw
